methodRU: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
methodEN: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
noteRU: WHITE RUSSIAN – Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly.
noteEN: WHITE RUSSIAN – Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly.

methodRU: In an Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.
methodEN: In an Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.
